1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Two sisters, Xia Man Li and Xia Man An go to an anniversary party and a school reunion in search of their lost loves.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: After confessing her love for Ying Jie, Man An ends up as his chauffeur. Man Li gets drunk and embarrasses herself in front of Li Qi.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Man Li reluctantly starts dating Li Qi. After Ying Qian makes the tabloids for his partying behavior, he agrees to be set up on a blind date by his mother.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Xuan Xuan approaches Man An to teach her more about Ying Jie. Ying Qian's partying ruins a potential business deal.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Man An intervenes and gets a major client to sign a contract with Ying Jie. Man Li and Li Qi find dating and maintaining their professional status at work difficult.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The Xia family gets a visit from the oldest brother Man Wu. Man An gets offered a job, but is worried about her feelings for Ying Jie getting in the way.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Man An's refusal of the job offer upsets her family and Ying Jie. Despite a valid excuse, when Ying Qian doesn't show up for his blind date, his father goes into a blind rage.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Man Li and Li Qi go on a date and share a kiss, but their coworkers have discovered their secret romance. After some convincing from the Chairman, Man An accepts the job offer.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Man An starts her job, but it's Ying Jie who ends up lovesick with her at the company. Man Li's friends confront her about her relationship.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Ying Jie is exhausted and stressed out from work and his feelings for Man An. Auntie Ping forces Man Li to invite Li Qi to dinner.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: The family prepares for Li Qi's visit. Ying Jie has a big request for Xuan Xuan.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Ying Jie breaks off the engagement with Xuan Xuan, and Man Li tries to declare her love for Li Qi before he goes on a business trip.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: With Xuan Xuan gone from the office, Man An tries to figure out who the other woman is. Ying Qian gets told off by a woman with a grudge.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Ying Jie tries to keep his distance from Man An. Man Li gets into trouble while Li Qi is out of town.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: After getting drunk the night before, Man Li wakes up with a strange man. Ying Jie's parents find out about the broken engagement.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Li Qi returns from his trip and Man Li cannot bear to face him.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Xuan Xuan figures out that Man An is the one Ying Jie loves. Ying Qian gets his blind date to give him another shot.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Man Li finally comes clean to Li Qi, leaving him to think about it on his own. Ying Qing tries to make amends by having Sun over for lunch.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Sun Yu Qing agrees to go on a date with Ying Qian. Despite confirming the engagement, Ying Jie tells Man An his true feelings.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: After revealing his feelings to Man An, Ying Jie decides to keep his family happy rather than start a relationship. But Xuan Xuan shows up to tell his parents the truth.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Papa Xia is furious when he learns of Man An's feelings for Ying Jie. Ying Qian makes headway in his courtship with Yu Qing.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Both families are in turmoil as the Chairman fires Papa Xia and Auntie Ping.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Everyone leaps into action as Ying Jie tries to run away from all his problems. Later he tells Man An his lifelong secret.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Man An comes up with a plan to test Ying Jie's devotion to his father, but the Chairman tries to bribe her to stay away!

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: The Xia and Zheng families can't stay apart for very long. Man Li learns what really happened that night.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Man Wu's proposal does not go as planned and Man An gets stood up.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: When Ying Jie shows up to visit Man An in the country, her Granny puts him to work. The rest of the Xia family tries to figure out why Xin Ru didn't accept Man Wu's proposal.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Man An's Granny tests if Ying Jie is worthy of Man An's love. Papa Xia gets a new job with a little help with a character from Man Li's past.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: After the truth about Ying Jie's parentage is out in the open, the Zheng family struggles to move forward.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Ying Jie is on his own, his father fires him and he has to find a new job. Ying Qian and Man Li meet us to discuss his family and end up catching a criminal.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: When the Chairman has a heart attack, he finally tells Ying Jie how he really feels about him.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: After Papa Xia invites him over for a meal, He Shang De and Man Xi run into a conflict. Ying Jie presents Man An with love contract. Yu Qing tries to cut Ying Qian out her life, but ends up being too cruel.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Papa Xia enlists his family to help He Shang De. Man An and Ying Jie do all sorts of romantic things together, but it seems like Man Li's romance is in trouble.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Yu Qing and Ying Qian end up adopting a puppy. Ying Jie does battle with a claw machine to win a stuffed animal for Man An. Li Qi has been seen around a mysterious woman.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Man Wu quits his job to start his own business. When the Chairman gets out of the hospital, he meets with Man An.

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: The Deputy General Manager twists Li Qi's words and tries to drive a wedge between him and Man Li. Man An and Ying Jie go on their first official date.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Man An and Ying Jie are permitted to get closer. The Deputy General Manager takes Le Er's promotion away and gives it to Man Li.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: The Deputy General Manager causes more strife for Man Li and her coworkers. Man An is presumed drowned causing Ying Jie and her siblings to panic.

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Xiang Ning causes more strife when City Mart stops doing business with He Shang De. Man Wu's business woes are revealed. And Ying Jie prepares to propose to Man Li.

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: Man Wu and Xin Ru have a huge fight over money. Man An postpones her engagement in order to prove herself to Mr. Zheng.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: As Man An tries to prove her worth, Madam and Cui Ping conspire to make Man An and Ying Jie declare an official engagement. Man Li tries to reconcile with Li Qi to repair Xiang Ning's damage.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: The families are thrilled and begin preparing for the engagement. When Man Li sees Xiang Ning kissing Li Qi, it's time to set some boundaries.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: When Ying Jie goes on a trip, Ying Qian leaves Man An in charge of his dog. Man Wu secretly continues to try to open his shop behind Xin Ru's back.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Man An goes in search of four-leaf clovers and the perfect wedding dress. While on a business trip, Li Qi and Xiang Ning get assaulted.

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Man An's trip to find four-leaf clovers turns tragic when she gets injured and falls into a coma.

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Man An is up and out of her coma, but she has amnesia.

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Still without her memories, Man An returns home, but with a desire to move out. Xiang Ning persuades Li Qi to break up with Man Li.

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: Man An goes to site of her accident to regain her memories. He Shang De sees someone paying off Li Qi's attackers.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: Shang De declares his love for Man Li. Man An worries about what will happen if she never regains the memories of her family and Ying Jie.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Man Wu's lies have caught up with him and Xin Ru is nowhere to be found. Man An feels better after going to a support group.

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Xuan Xuan is confused when Man An says she doesn't mind if she goes after Ying Jie. Shang De goes after Man Li as Li Qi turns down Xiang Ning's advances.

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Man Wu goes to great lengths to win Xin Ru back and Grandma goes to great lengths to get Man An's memory back.

53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Man Li tries to deal with her legal issues and inspires Shang De in the baking contest.

54.title: Episode #1.54
54.plot: Man An and Ying Jie bond at Grandma's farm. Man Wu starts to get his act together, but it takes some help from Man Li for Xin Ru to forgive him.

55.title: Episode #1.55
55.plot: Man An decides to come home. Li Qi figures out the guy who is extorting Man Li is the same guy who assaulted Xiang Ning.

56.title: Episode #1.56
56.plot: Ying Qian tries to make Man An jealous to speed up her relationship with Ying Jie. Li Qi confronts Xiang Ning and pursues Man Li.

57.title: Episode #1.57
57.plot: With her family chiming in and her coworkers placing bets, Man Li comes closer to a decision on Li Qi and He Shang De.

58.title: Episode #1.58
58.plot: Man Li cuts Li Qi off completely. Ying Qian's trickery works and Man An and Ying Jie declare their love for each other.

59.title: Episode #1.59
59.plot: Shang De and Man Li bond after he rescues her from the bus terminal and treats her sprained ankle.

60.title: Episode #1.60
60.plot: Ying Jie's 'business trip' turns out to be a romantic getaway. Yu Qing takes Ying Qian out to cheer him up, but things go a little too far.

61.title: Episode #1.61
61.plot: After Man An accepts Ying Jie's proposal, the pressure's on for the rest of the couples to take the next step.

62.title: Episode #1.62
62.plot: Xiang Ning tell Man Li the real reason Li Qi broke up with her. Man An scrambles to repair a mistake she made at work.

63.title: Episode #1.63
63.plot: Man Li tells Shang De and Li Qi she needs some time to decide who she wants to be with. Man An and Ying Qian make their problems worse by confronting a major client.

64.title: Episode #1.64
64.plot: Ying Jie is still upset at Man An for her mistake. Man Li struggles to deal with both Shang De and Li Qi doubling their efforts to win her over.

65.title: Episode #1.65
65.plot: While celebrating Li Qi's birthday, Man Li's feelings for him are rekindled. Man Wu tries to propose again, only to lose the ring.

66.title: Episode #1.66
66.plot: Even as their wedding date approaches, Man An is concerned about doing a good job for Ying Jie at work. Shang De passes up an opportunity to wait for Man Li's answer.

67.title: Episode #1.67
67.plot: The wedding day is here, but in spite of the happy occasion, Ying Qian is heartbroken and Man Li has to find a way to reject Shang De.

68.title: Episode #1.68
68.plot: The wedding is over and there's already talk of a new baby. After Yu Qing slams Ying Qian's fingers in a door, he plans to use her sympathy to his advantage.

69.title: Episode #1.69
69.plot: The mothers set up a hidden camera to spy on Ying Qian and Yu Qing. Man An looks for Ying Jie's biological mother.

70.title: Episode #1.70
70.plot: It looks like Ying Qian's charms and tricks are working on Yu Qing. Li Qi defends Man Li from obnoxious customers.

71.title: Episode #1.71
71.plot: Li Qi gets fired for defending Man Li. After getting married and with a baby on the way, Man Wu steps up and takes responsibility.

72.title: Episode #1.72
72.plot: In the series finale, Man Li makes her final decision between Li Qi and Shang De, and Man An aids Ying Jie in his search for his birth mother.

imdb.title: Be with You
plot: Can a young woman gather the courage she needs to approach a high school crush? Hsia Man-Li ('Vivi Lee' (qv)) was always popular in school and was the prettiest girl of her high school, but she has always been unlucky in love.
